name: Space Conquerors
description:
Description

A small "Space Invaders" clone made as a final exam. 

Your objective is to destroy all aliens before they shoot you down or reach you. The more levels you beat, the harder it gets! 

Controls

Use A/D  to move along the sides and dodge enemy fire

Use Space bar to fire lasers and destroy your enemies
